name: Candy Crusaders
author: CharaForge AI
description: Forge fierce warriors with a sweet twist! This pack combines kawaii, gothic, and candy-coated aesthetics for a unique heavy-metal-meets-sugar-rush style. Perfect for creating unforgettable, vibrant heroines.
